text:
Die EU ist der 🌍 größte Spender von #COVID19-Impfstoffen. 

350 Mio. gespendete Dosen sollen vor allem über #COVAX an Länder mit niedrigem & mittlerem Einkommen gehen.

Ein großer Teil der global eingesetzten Impfstoffe ist made in 🇪🇺. 

🇪🇺 bleibt offen und hilft! https://t.co/84UXAem6GL

L'UE est le plus important donateur de vaccins contre le #COVID19.

Nous en avons partagé 350 millions, surtout via COVAX, qui les envoie maintenant aux pays vulnérables.

Beaucoup des doses utilisées dans le monde ont été exportées ou partagées par l'UE. 

D'autres viendront. https://t.co/oMbmYrz7zp

The EU is the biggest donor of #COVID19 vaccines in the world.

We shared 350 million doses so far - mostly via COVAX, which is now transferring them to low and middle-income countries.

A large part of doses used worldwide were exported or shared by the EU. 

And more will come. https://t.co/yNjHHleyLa

Ich gratuliere @karlnehammer zur heutigen Angelobung als Bundeskanzler der Republik Österreich.
 
🇪🇺 🇦🇹 Auf eine gute Zusammenarbeit! #StrongerTogether

#NextGenerationEU
#EUGreenDeal

Nachhaltiges Wirtschaften und ein bewusster Umgang mit Ressourcen wird zur neuen Norm in Europa.

Jetzt ist es wichtig, dass wir an Tempo zulegen und dass wir die Welt mitnehmen auf diesem Weg.

Der #EUGreenDeal ist unsere neue Wachstumsstrategie.

¡Buenas noticias para España 🇪🇸!

España ha avanzado lo suficiente en la implementación de su plan nacional de #NextGenerationEU

Por lo tanto, será el primer país de la UE en recibir un pago, con valor de €10 mil millones, una vez que los demás Estados miembros lo autoricen. https://t.co/PMVDZf1YbL

Our G7 leaders’ commitment echoes the 🇪🇺 #GlobalGateway approach.
 
With #GlobalGateway we’ll invest in infrastructure that will make the world greener, more connected and fairer. 

We’ll show that there is a different way to improve people’s lives, with value-driven investments. https://t.co/Q86DgfryAD

Deeply saddened by the passing of Mgr Aldo Giordano.

The EU has benefited from his remarkable diplomatic skills when he took up the role of dean of the diplomatic corps to the EU.

He was a good man, dedicated to peace and dialogue. A true European.

We honour his memory.

🇪🇪 Delighted to meet @AlarKaris and to congratulate him on his election as President of Estonia. 

We discussed our 🇪🇺 response to #COVID19, the situation with Belarus & security developments in Ukraine.

Estonia is a digital frontrunner. I’m looking forward to our cooperation! https://t.co/2T59OzQQ0B

Chanukkah is about hope - a flicker of light.

My hope and wish for Chanukkah is to see Jewish life prosper in Europe.

I want a Union that cherishes its diversity and honours Jewish heritage. 

Chag Chanukkah Sameah. https://t.co/lg1MaSJsFn

Our #GlobalGateway strategy will meet the needs of #EULAC partners.

Let’s build infrastructure and together set rules and standards in line with our values.

Looking forward to launching our Digital Alliance next spring, to boost innovation on both sides of the Atlantic. https://t.co/QTdlORdijC

The EU stands with Latin America and the Caribbean.
 
On top of a €3 billion COVID support package, we exported over 130 million vaccine doses to the region.
 
We will join forces to address the climate crisis.
 
We will support you to tackle deforestation in the Amazon. #EULAC https://t.co/i5NjVmJ8nB

Vești bune pentru România: prima tranșă din fondurile #NextGenerationEU
 
Împreună vom asigura tranziția verde și tranziția digitală, vom moderniza sistemul de sănătate și vom consolida administrația publică din 🇷🇴
 
Acum cuvântul-cheie este: implementare. Suntem alături de voi. https://t.co/l6eaAhwbnk

Good news for Romania with the 1st disbursement of #NextGenerationEU funds.

Together we will secure the green and digital transition, modernise the health system and strengthen public administration in 🇷🇴
 
Now the keyword is: implementation. 

We are ready to support you. https://t.co/fogUBnsgdG

Le couple 🇫🇷🇩🇪 qu’il forma avec Helmut Schmidt fut le moteur d’une Europe forte et plus unie.
 
Leur complicité fut essentielle pour sortir l’Europe de son sommeil et de faire un grand pas en avant.

Cette amitié, cette conviction, cet engagement continueront de nous inspirer. https://t.co/KCPAHz9rIc

Président moderne, son mandat a changé la vie des Françaises.
 
Ces avancées majeures pour les droits des femmes ont permis à des millions de prendre leur destin en main.
 
De choisir pour elles-mêmes. Et de se sentir davantage protégées par la loi. https://t.co/Q6aVSsTo3i

Toute sa vie, Valéry Giscard d’Estaing fit avancer la cause d’une Europe unie et guérie de sa maladie de guerre.

Jeune député ayant approuvé le Traité de Rome, il plaidait encore l’an passé pour une Europe de la santé et un plan de relance ambitieux. https://t.co/mrGDYGsvhY

Good calls with @UN’s @FilippoGrandi and @IOMchief Vitorino
 
We are coordinating closely on the repatriation of people stranded in Belarus and humanitarian aid.
 
We also discussed developments in Afghanistan and the importance of supporting countries in the region. https://t.co/9ELVztPo4R

About 1 billion doses have been delivered in the EU.

Over 360 million doses of mRNA vaccines will be delivered by the end of the first quarter 2022. 

This is sufficient for all fully vaccinated Europeans to get a booster. 

So go get it. https://t.co/sHQwm2yslo

To succeed, #GlobalGateway must be a #TeamEurope project & must involve the private sector.

It also needs political leadership and alignment with like-minded partners.

I discussed this with @POTUS Biden. We want to show that democracies and value-driven investments can deliver. https://t.co/GnXGW27dek

We are now facing a double challenge in the fight against #COVID19.
  
The rapid resurgence of Delta across Europe and a new variant of concern: Omicron.

Full vaccination and boosters provide the strongest protection there is. And they are available now. https://t.co/FOuda4Jbvj

#GlobalGateway will support the green and digital transitions globally, with up to €300 billion mobilised by 2027.
 
From renewable hydrogen to underwater data cables connecting continents. 

It will also focus on transport, healthcare and education. https://t.co/UGOOKNw7RD

Many countries need a trusted partner to design sustainable, quality projects.

Projects that are implemented in all transparency and that deliver lasting social and economic benefits to local communities. 

#GlobalGateway is that positive offer. https://t.co/p0HrCwEIqY

For two years, the @EU_Commission focused on the green and digital transitions in Europe. 

We have invested massively in infrastructure and skills. 

Today, with #GlobalGateway we show that Europe will support its partners around the world to do the same. https://t.co/L7u7jFnIhx

Today I will present Europe’s new connectivity strategy: Global Gateway.

With Global Gateway, #TeamEurope will invest in quality infrastructure, in a fair and sustainable way.

Connecting the world, and protecting our planet. https://t.co/uuN7vBM3c4

I just talked to Prime Minister of Iraq @MAKadhimi 
 
We are cooperating closely on repatriation flights to ensure the safe return of Iraqi nationals stranded in Belarus. https://t.co/78IevmFjij

Glad to meet the Prime Ministers of Georgia 🇬🇪 Moldova 🇲🇩  and Ukraine 🇺🇦
 
Let's bring our Association Agreements to full potential and strengthen our cooperation across the board.
 
Looking forward to our summit to give fresh impetus to our Easter Partnership. https://t.co/CPeOs7dQUD

Today's meeting of Commissioners on the pandemic discussed:

• Presence of #Omicron in the EU
• Increasing capacity for sequencing, testing and contact-tracing
• Stepping up vaccination & boosters
• Measures taken at external borders
• Repatriation flights for EU citizens https://t.co/MuV7LUIuRs

Guter Austausch @a_schallenberg zur COVID-Lage in 🇦🇹 und 🇪🇺

#Omicron ist Anlass zur Sorge.

Wir müssen mehr Impfen, Boostern, Testen und alles tun, die Ausbreitung zu bremsen. Laboranalysen und Kontaktverfolgung sind sehr wichtig.

🇪🇺 kämpft gemeinsam gegen die Pandemie. https://t.co/vYsDq14eGW

🇫🇷🇪🇺 Ravie de rencontrer le Président du Sénat @gerard_larcher à l’approche de la présidence française de l’UE.
 
Nous avons fait un tour d'horizon des sujets d'actualité.

Le Parlement français contribuera à faire de cette présidence un succès. https://t.co/tjAJp813yW

Renewable hydrogen will be key to the climate-neutral economy of the future.
 
I’m proud that Europe is the world’s clean hydrogen trailblazer.
 
Now is the time to invest in our leadership. 
 
€30 billion from #NextGenerationEU will go to clean energy, including clean hydrogen.

The EU & its Member States will work hard to achieve the global vaccination target of 70% in 2022.
 
We will support capacity building for sequencing, testing, treatments and vaccination.
 
We aim to share at least 700 million doses by mid-2022 with low & middle-income countries. https://t.co/mDgnA3fbxS

Let's be better prepared against future pandemics.

I welcome the start of negotiations for a global agreement on prevention, preparedness and response.

I also support a new financial intermediary fund for global health security.

#WHASpecial https://t.co/eUUzyU0MP9

We take the #Omicron variant very seriously. While scientists analyse it in detail, it is important to remain vigilant and to protect ourselves.

Get vaccinated, if not done yet, and take your booster as soon as possible. https://t.co/AUcLRB5Ho1

Let's take the EU-@NATO cooperation to the next level.

We and @jensstoltenberg are working on a new Joint Declaration.

Our goal: to renew and update our political commitment to a strong EU-NATO alliance.

The EU and NATO stand firm. And we stand united. https://t.co/RsDqtxjBGY

Delighted to visit @STRATCOMCOE 
 
The experts working here make our neighbourhood and cyberspace safer.
 
They will help us reinforce our response to hybrid attacks.
 
These men and women embody the long-standing cooperation between the EU and @NATO. https://t.co/h00UakzlmE

To act in a timely, effective manner, proper information and analysis capacity is essential.

This is why the EU needs its own Joint Situational Awareness Centre.

Such a centre would help the EU bundle its  know-how on countering hybrid attacks. https://t.co/UHaua62J50

🇱🇻 When one of our Member States is attacked, the EU stands united.

We are with Latvia in these challenging times, providing human and financial support. https://t.co/TeR3paEa4f

We have long been working together.

We are testing and coordinating our crisis responses during regular exercises.
 
And we are stepping up our cooperation on resilience, situational awareness and on fighting disinformation. https://t.co/dJtwalLGC5

Lukashenko has failed in his bid to undermine EU unity and solidarity. 

But we should learn the lessons. Our opponents will stop at nothing to destabilise us.

To respond to such events, it is important that the EU and @NATO work hand in hand. https://t.co/ZhND0TcR6S

Lithuania has been responding to this attack humanely and firmly. 

The EU stands by your side and supports you to manage your border.
 
🇱🇹 benefits from €37 million in emergency assistance.
 
We are tripling border management funds for 🇱🇹🇱🇻🇵🇱 to €200 million in 2021 and 2022. https://t.co/RjDRCxGDW1

Good to be in Vilnius 🇱🇹 today with @NATO SG @jensstoltenberg.
 
We are here to express our full solidarity with Lithuania in the face of the hybrid attack led by the Belarus regime and highlight our good EU @NATO cooperation. https://t.co/IhbTFCPobq

After we triggered emergency brake to tackle #Omicron, working on all tracks with Commissioners in charge, to:

Speed up vaccination, boosters

Scale up testing, contact-tracing of people coming from concerned region

Boost sequencing, wastewater analysis, to locate the variant https://t.co/1xnaIQOgf4

Very fruitful discussions this evening with @sbancel @AlbertBourla and Uğur Şahin of @moderna_tx and @BioNTech_Group @Pfizer

They explained their efforts to quickly and thoroughly understand the #Omicron variant and adjust our strategies accordingly.

Time is of the essence. https://t.co/PvOduQi6QV

The European Union's contracts with manufacturers say that the vaccine must be adapted immediately to new variants as they emerge.

Europe has taken precautions. https://t.co/yVlLx7GcmI

The news about the new COVID variant is very concerning.

I have talked to scientists and vaccine manufacturers today. They share the concern.

Please get vaccinated as soon as possible, if not done yet.

And follow the known rules to protect yourself. https://t.co/eSKPzr8J5Q

Asia matters to Europe.
 
As continents of innovation, we both look towards the future with confidence.
 
Together we will ensure the health of our citizens, our economies and of our planet. 
 
#ASEM https://t.co/oevGtRiyml
The @EU_Commission will propose, in close coordination with Member States, to activate the emergency brake to stop air travel from the southern African region due to the variant of concern B.1.1.529.

Felicitări @NicolaeCiuca pentru investirea în funcția de prim ministru! 

Vom lucra împreună cu noul guvern român pentru a găsi soluții împotriva pandemiei și pentru a implementa planul național de redresare și reziliență.

Impfen rettet Leben. 

Die neue COVID-Welle können wir mit mehr Impfungen niederdrücken. Eine Auffrischung nach 6 Monaten sorgt dafür, dass wir nochmal deutlich besser geschützt sind.

Europa hat genug Impfstoff bestellt. Ende der Woche sind bereits 1 Mrd Dosen in 🇪🇺 ausgeliefert https://t.co/AaryRfW0m3
